It’s never too early to start thinking about how you are going to feed your 
baby. Breastfeeding gives your baby the best possible start in life as it 
has lots of benefits for both you and your baby that last a 
lifetime. Discuss your plans with your partner and family 
as their help is important. You might like to watch the 
Bump to Breastfeedin
